title: Old Katamon Cafe
typeOfFood: Vegan-friendly, Lacto, Ovo, American, Pizza, Italian, Mediterranean, Middle Eastern
description: A 100% vegetarian/vegan cafe in the south Jerusalem neighborhood of Old Katamon located in an historically-preserved 100-year-old building. Regular dairy vegetarian menu consists of pasta, pizza, sandwiches and salads. Also has a full vegan menu with all of the above and more, plus daily specials. The cafe offers indoor and outdoor seating, and is family friendly.
